ideas.title: Waymo resumes service in San Francisco after robotaxis stall during blackout
ideas.description: Waymo suspended its SF robotaxi service on Saturday evening after a massive blackout appeared to leave many of its vehicles stalled on city streets.
hooks: 5 Shocking Revelations from Waymo's SF Robotaxi Blackout
When AI Meets Urban Chaos: Waymo's Unexpected Challenge
Robotaxis vs. Blackout: The Tech Resilience Test

tips: Use real-time screenshots from the blackout incident
Include a personal narrative about AI urban resilience
Create an interactive poll about reader's autonomous vehicle expectations
Include technical deep-dive into robotaxi navigation challenges
Use SEO-optimized headers for each listicle point
Add expert quotes from autonomous vehicle engineers
Frame listicle as professional industry insight
Include data visualization of autonomous vehicle performance
Highlight potential business implications of technology disruption

visualDirection.description: High-contrast cyberpunk-inspired design with glitchy urban overlays, neon blue/grey color palette, fragmented typography suggesting technological disruption, animated graphic elements showing robotaxis in urban grid with intermittent blackout effects

exampleOutline: Introduction: The Unexpected Urban Tech Challenge
